wissim.controller.filters.gui.editor

Class EditorComponent.EditableTC.ControllerDocumentFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.text.DocumentFilter
      • wissim.controller.filters.gui.editor.EditorComponent.EditableTC.ControllerDocumentFilter
  • Enclosing class:
    EditorComponent.EditableTC

     class EditorComponent.EditableTC.ControllerDocumentFilter
extends javax.swing.text.DocumentFilter
    DocumentFilter instance to handle any user's input, in order to react to text changes and to also provide autocompletion.
